in campaign, i doubt you could get your str that high anyway :)

--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "Daniel Paul Hightower" 
<dph_of_rules@u...> wrote:
> Well, I discovered the limit for mages.  When you get to strength 
> level 21934, any strength beyond that point is *free*.
> 
> (I'm just curious how the limits for determing what stats cost 
money 
> came across.)
